trough.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a long narrow open container that holds water or food for animals
trough.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a short period of low activity, low prices etc
trough.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The graph showed peaks and troughs of activity.
trough.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the hollow area between two waves
trough.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a long area of fairly low pressure between two areas of high pressure
trough.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the lowest point in a series of prices, values etc
trough.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the peaks and troughs of investing in stocks and shares
When would the nation come out of its economic trough?
